Key Match Events: Afghanistan bowlers were taken to the cleaners by West Indies batters, with Nicholas Pooran scoring heavily
Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan will have to improve their bowling in the next matches, specifically in the powerplay and getting out of tricky overs
Afghanistan will face India in their next match in T20 World Cup 2024
Post-Match Reflections: Afghanistan's head coach Jonathan Trott argued that the team needs to improve their bowling ahead of their Super 8 encounter against India
Miscellaneous Highlights: The wind factor was to the bigger boundary but West Indies batters were still able to clear it well
Chasing a target like 220 is always going to be tricky
Others: Afghanistan finished second in Group C with three out of four possible wins
